summary: Unit test suite that verifies the Nginx plugin’s HTTP‑01 challenge handling, including default listen address behavior, generation of module configuration with deduplication, HTTPS‑only mode, bucket directives, and inclusion of auxiliary files, as well as the overall challenge execution flow.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the Certbot Nginx integration for HTTP‑01 challenges, ensuring reliable automated certificate issuance and preventing configuration errors in production deployments.
